wmcadsHubPageBannerProps.name: title
wmcadsHubPageBannerProps.description: Required. Title content to use in the banner.

wmcadsHubPageBannerProps.name: contentHTML
wmcadsHubPageBannerProps.description: Required. HTML content to use in the banner.

wmcadsHubPageBannerProps.name: image
wmcadsHubPageBannerProps.description: Required. Url for the image to be displayed in the banner.

wmcadsHubPageBannerProps.name: logo
wmcadsHubPageBannerProps.description: Transport mode the banner relates to. This will determine the icon and background colour which is displayed. Accepted values are bus, rail, metro, roads, walk, cycle and eScooter. If not set, will default to bus.
